name: Oh My Diary
description: (Trigger warning: emotional abuse, abusive relationship) Oh My Diary is a text-based game where a college student, Sophia, writes about her experience with an abusive boyfriend, Owen. In this game, players must make choices throughout history. Some options may appear in gray, representing options that are not currently available. As the player progresses in the game, he is left with less and less options. This game represents the dynamics of emotional abuse where the abuser is taking away the victim's choices.
